column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " What do you mean you wo n't teach me ?
#Text=" Katara says : " But there must be other female waterbenders in your tribe !
#Text=" Pakku says : " Here , the women learn from Yagoda to use their waterbending to heal .
#Text=I 'm sure she would be happy to take you as her student , despite your bad attitude .
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't want to heal , I want to fight !
#Text=" Pakku says : " I can see that .
#Text=But our tribe has customs , rules .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , your rules stink !
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , they 're not fair !
#Text=If you wo n't teach Katara , then ... " Pakku says : " Then what ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Then I wo n't learn from you !
#Text=" Pakku says : " Well , have fun teaching yourself !
#Text=I 'm sure you 'll do a great job .
#Text=" Katara says : " Wait !
#Text=Aang did n't mean that !
#Text=You ca n't risk your training for me .
#Text=You have to learn from Master Pakku , even if he is a big jerk .
#Text=" Pakku says : " Why do n't we get started , then ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Princess Yue , good morning !
#Text=How about that picnic last night ?
#Text=Boy , your dad sure does know how to throw a party .
#Text=" Yue says : " I 'm happy you enjoyed yourself .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , it was n't as much fun after you left .
#Text=So , I 'm still hoping we can see more of each other .
#Text=" Yue says : " Do an activity , you mean ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yes ... at a place ... for some time .
#Text=" Yue says : " I 'd love to .
#Text=I 'll meet you on that bridge tonight .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Great !
#Text=I 'll see you – Ah !
#Text=" Yue says : " Sorry .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's okay , it was worth it .
#Text=See you tonight .
#Text=" Zhao says : " I 'm very impressed .
#Text=You all seem highly qualified for the mission I have in mind .
#Text=" Oh says : " That 's some tasty gold .
#Text=" Pirate captain says : " What do you need us to do ?
#Text=" Zhao says : " I believe you 're acquainted with Prince Zuko .
#Text=" Katara says : " Uhhh ... Hi .
#Text=Are you Yagoda ?
#Text=" Yagoda says : " Are you here for the healing lesson ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I guess I am .
#Text=" Yagoda says : " Welcome ... welcome !
#Text=" Pakku says : " You 're moving the water around , but you 're not feeling the push and pull .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm trying ... " Pakku says : " Maybe that move is too advanced for you .
#Text=Why do n't you try an easier one ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Thanks for the lesson .
#Text=" Yagoda says : " So , who 's the lucky boy ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Huh ?
#Text=" Yagoda says : " Your betrothal necklace .
#Text=You 're getting married , right ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Ah ... No .
#Text=I do n't think I 'm ready for that yet .
#Text=My grandmother gave my mother this necklace and my mother passed it down to me .
#Text=" Yagoda says : " I recognize this carving !
#Text=I do n't know why I did n't realize sooner ; you 're the spitting image of Kanna !
#Text=" Katara says : " Wait , how do you know my Gran - Gran 's name ?
#Text=" Yagoda says : " When I was about your age , I was friends with Kanna .
#Text=She was born here in the Northern Tribe .
#Text=" Katara says : " She never told me .
#Text=" Yagoda says : " Your grandmother had an arranged marriage with a young waterbender .
#Text=He carved that necklace for her .
#Text=" Katara says : " If Gran - Gran was engaged , why did she leave ?
#Text=" Yagoda says : " I do n't know .
#Text=That 's always been a mystery to me .
#Text=She left without saying goodbye .
#Text=" Crew member says : " Good luck !
#Text=" Iroh says : " The crew wanted me to wish you safe travels .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Good riddance to those traitors .
#Text=" Iroh says : " It 's a lovely night for a walk .
#Text=Why do n't you join me ?
#Text=It would clear your head .
#Text=Or just stay in your room and sit in the dark .
#Text=Whatever makes you happy .
#Text=" Oh says : " Careful with the blasting jelly !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uncle ?
#Text=Uncle , is that you ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Zuko !
#Text=Zuko ... " Sokka says : " Hi , Princess Yue .
#Text=I made you something .
#Text=I carved it myself .
#Text=" Yue says : " It 's a bear .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Actually , it 's supposed to be a fish .
#Text=See , it has a fin .
#Text=" Yue says : " Oh .
#Text=I 'm sorry , I made a mistake .
#Text=I should n't have asked you to come here .
#Text=" Katara says : " How 's warrior training going ?
#Text=" Aang says : " That bad ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , it 's Princess Yue .
#Text=I do n't get it , one minute she wants to go out with me , and the next , she 's telling me to get lost .
#Text=So , how 's waterbending training ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Master Poophead wo n't teach her because she 's a girl .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why do n't you just teach her , Aang ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Why did n't I think of that ?
#Text=At night , you can teach me whatever moves you learn from Master Pakku !
#Text=That way , you have someone to practice with , and I get to learn waterbending !
#Text=Everyone 's happy !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm not happy .
#Text=" Katara says : " But you 're never happy .
#Text=Come on , Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " Master Pakku said this move is all about sinking and floating .
#Text=" Katara says : " I got it !
#Text=" Aang says : " That was amazing !
#Text=" Katara says : " That was n't me .
#Text=" Aang says : " I was just showing Katara a few moves .
#Text=" Pakku says : " You have disrespected me , my teachings , and my entire culture .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sorry , I ... " Pakku says : " You are no longer welcome as my student .
#Text=" Arnook says : " What do you want me to do ?
#Text=Force Master Pakku to take Aang back as his student ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Yes ... please !
#Text=" Arnook says : " I suspect he might change his mind , if you swallow your pride and apologize to him .
#Text=" Katara says : " Fine .
#Text=" Pakku says : " I 'm waiting , little girl .
#Text=" Katara says : " No .
#Text=No way am I apologizing to a sour old man like you !
#Text=" Aang says : " Uhhh ... Katara ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'll be outside if you 're man enough to fight me .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sure she did n't mean that .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , I think she did .
#Text=" Zhao says : " I 'm devastated to hear about Prince Zuko .
#Text=Just ... devastated .
#Text=" Iroh says : " The Fire Lord will not be pleased when he learns who was responsible .
#Text=" Zhao says : " You know who was behind the attack ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Yes ... pirates .
#Text=We had a run - in with them a while back .
#Text=They wanted revenge .
#Text=" Zhao says : " So , have you reconsidered my offer ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Yes , I accept .
#Text=It will be an honor to serve as your general .
#Text=To the Fire Nation !
#Text=" Zhao says : " To victory !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Are you crazy , Katara ?
#Text=You 're not going to win this fight !
#Text=" Katara says : " I know !
#Text=I do n't care !
#Text=" Aang says : " You do n't have to do this for me .
#Text=I can find another teacher .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm not doing it for you !
#Text=Someone needs to slap some sense into that guy !
#Text=So , you decided to show up ?
#Text=Are n't you going to fight ?
#Text=" Pakku says : " Go back to the healing huts with the other women where you belong .
#Text=Fine .
#Text=You want to learn to fight so bad ?
#Text=Study closely !
#Text=Do n't worry , I 'm not going to hurt you !
#Text=" Katara says : " You ca n't knock me down !
#Text=" Aang says : " Go , Katara !
#Text=" Pakku says : " Well , I 'm impressed .
#Text=You are an excellent waterbender .
#Text=" Katara says : " But you still wo n't teach me , will you ?
#Text=" Pakku says : " No .
#Text=" Pakku says : " This fight is over .
#Text=" Katara says : " Come back here .
#Text=I 'm not finished yet !
#Text=" Pakku says : " Yes , you are .
#Text=This is my necklace ... " Katara says : " No , it 's not .
#Text=It 's mine !
#Text=Give it back !
#Text=" Pakku says : " I made this sixty years ago for the love of my life ... for Kanna .
#Text=" Katara says : " My Gran - Gran was supposed to marry you ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Our plan is working perfectly .
#Text=Zhao does n't suspect a thing .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You did n't have to do this .
#Text=" Iroh says : " No nephew of mine is going to stow away on a ship without some backup .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Thank you , Uncle .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Someone 's coming .
#Text=Stay hidden until we get to the North Pole and the Avatar will be yours .
#Text=Good luck .
#Text="
